programme.title: Wild Castles
programme.desc: Deep in the South of France stands the hilltop fortress of Carcassonne which was once the center of wealth and culture for over 2000 years. This region saw multiple changes in conquest as well as the rise and fall of Catharism. In this episode, explore the stunning wildlife of the region including the majestic Eagle owl, rambunctious wildcats, and more.(n)

programme.title: 9 Supergirl#9
programme.desc: In the final part of the three-part crossover of Supergirl, The Flash and Arrow, the reality of Earth-1 is altered by a psychiatrist, John Deegan, with the help of The Book of Destiny, making Kara prisoner, Barry Allen and Oliver Green criminals and he himself a tyrant Superman. Barry and Oliver seek help from Cisco Ramon to retrieve Superman from Earth-38 to overcome the Book of Destiny and restore Earth-1 back to normal..(n)

programme.title: Straight Talk
programme.desc: "A new coronavirus outbreak in Hong Kong: What went wrong?" Guest: Professor David Hui.(n)

programme.title: Clay Time
programme.desc: Clay Time is an animated series mainly for 3-5 year-olds, with an innovative narrative that links early learner stories and manual activities. A narrator invites young viewers to tag along as she comes up with different animals made out of clay. Through a series of sweet stories, the narrator and her magic palette of colors help viewers create a fun, colorful world made out of modelling clay.(n)

programme.title: Showers of Blessing
programme.desc: Showers of Blessing productions search for real testimonies from Chinese people around the world. Every episode is an authentic, touching story with real characters and events, and is broadcast in Hong Kong and over 50 other countries and cities, delivering a message of faith, hope, and love to viewers.(n)

programme.title: When I Grow Up
programme.desc: When I Grow Up! is the creation of Mikaela, who is on a quest to determine what she wants to be when she grows up. Fuelled by curiosity and a passion for STEM. Mikaela makes videos of her journey in a DIY production studio located in her parents garage. Her goal is to inspire and educate kids like her who are curious about the world of careers.(n)

programme.title: Little Big World
programme.desc: The world is smaller than you think in this award-winning time-lapse series. Little Big World turns the most beautiful locations on earth into adorable miniature models. Travel the globe in this bite-size show from Chicago to the Niagara Falls, from the Bahamas to the Austrian Alps.(n)

programme.title: Our Family
programme.desc: Our Family is a BAFTA award winning documentary series with integral digital content that celebrates the everyday magic of family life in the UK for 3-7 year olds. Follows the daily lives of young children and their families. Their stories are entertaining, funny, inspiring, sometimes sad – but always filmed from a child’s perspective, telling real-life tales of what it means to be part of family life.(n)

programme.title: Mouk
programme.desc: Mouk and Chavapa are two globetrotters cycling around the world! From Ouagadougou to New York, from Australia to Madagascar and Greece, the two buddies discover the world and its inhabitants... And as everything's different from home, adventure is always at the end of the road.(n)

programme.title: Arthur
programme.desc: Based on the popular children’s books, Arthur chronicles the adventures of Arthur through engaging, emotional stories that explore issues faced by real kids. Whether showing the importance of honesty, addressing how to deal with a crisis, or modeling positive sibling relationships, Arthur tackles each story with empathy and humor. The program aims to foster an interest in reading and writing, and to encourage positive social skills.(n)

programme.title: News of the Wild and Secure Homeland
programme.desc: News of the Wild is an animal focused, factual entertainment news show aimed at 7-12 year olds. Bursting at the seams with animals, laughter, news and information, it is sure to have universal appeal. The News of the Wild team are dedicated to keeping audiences up to date with the latest from the animal kingdom, presenting their animal news and magazine stories in an ‘as-live’ news format.(n)

programme.title: Today in History and Earth Live
Extreme Cake Makers
programme.desc: A one-year-old who is a dream comes true to her parents, a hard-to-pleased pastor, a visionary fashion designer, how our sugar craft specialists pull out all stops to meet their demands for bigger, better and more delicate cakes? Nastassja, Eloise and Molly show that it's both difficult and satifying in bringing their clients' visions come to life.(n)

programme.title: America's Got Talent
programme.desc: This first episode of the finals sees the first five acts perform to advance to the Top 5. This episode opens with an amazing performance of Kanye West's "Heartless" by violinist Brian King Joseph, followed by Daniel Emmet performing "Perfect Symphony" by Andrea Bocelli. Also, a hilarious set from stand-up comedienne Vicki Barbolak, an incredible rendition of Leona Lewis' "Run" by Glennis Grace, and a sensational routine from Zurcaroh.(n)

They quickly find themselves in the middle of the war to end all wars as these two immortal tribes clash in a fearsome, bloody confrontation.(n)

In short, Roger and Fatou spend their time saving the island from their own mistakes and blunders.(n)

Tom Kirkman has to struggle to keep the country and his own family from falling apart, while navigating the highly volatile political arena, leading the investigation about the sinister plan behind the terrorist act.(n)

programme.title: 2 Designated Survivor#2

programme.title: 60 Minutes
programme.desc: Six years ago a missile brought down Malaysia Flight 17 over eastern Ukraine killing 298 onboard. Three Russian go on trial in a Dutch courtroom./ Public monuments to the Confederacy have been generating controversy and sometimes violence over what critics consider their racist symbolism. Should they stay or should they be removed? / 60 MINUTES gets access to rehearsals of the modernized vision of this classic of the American musical theater.(n)
晉堅透過閉路電視得知兇手身份，又逼浩揚提供鷹眼情報，兩人變得水火不容。若玲向浩揚求助，浩揚帶她到鎗會學習射擊。明珠遇上流氓生事，卻令她重拾作為警察的決心和意志。若玲因子康病情惡化，決定走上復仇道路.(n)

丁巧等人被人開鎗襲擊，丁峰及上善因而遷怒丁巧，並打算將丁巧及浩揚的犯罪證據提供警方以劃清界線。丁巧被家人出賣，遂希望浩揚可以跟自己潛逃到南美。明珠重返重案組，上司向她透露將晉升為高級督察.(n)
(大結局)浩揚綁架上善及丁峰。若玲決定將黑錢交給警方，洪爺越押找若玲報仇，明珠與他火拚時受重傷。浩揚以上善及丁峰的性命作威脅，要求晉堅和自己展開生死決鬥。最後，兩人手鎗只剩下一發子彈，並同時指向對方心臟.(n)
